Text: Finally, Zacks Investment Research upgraded Enerplus from a strong sell rating to a hold rating in a research report on Monday. One research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, four have issued a hold rating and five have issued a buy rating to the stock. The company has an average rating of Hold and an average target price of $15.46.
